title: What is your crazy post-pandemic prediction? - Quora

response.answer_text: Trump will win the elections by declaring victory over the virus just before the elections, and telling (lying) that a vaccine and a treatment are found and will be distributed to all voters, red states first. According to Trump, China will pay the costs. Fauci will endorse this, while looking very bleak, and disappear right after his statement. Of course, there will be no properly tested vaccine or cure and the Chinese won’t pay, and the miracle treatment will kill more people than it saves, and the economy will keep plummeting, but that is just what the US people voted for.

The mass and social media will admit that they jumped the gun, panicking everyone into overreacting on scant evidence of real danger more than a bad flu season. The “experts” with their scary charts and worst-case projections will then make public statements declaring that they were not only wrong but that their projections were based on the flimsiest of evidence. While this is happening, large but diminishing numbers of people will scream “coverup” while demanding that not only social distancing but quarantine be enforced by law until a 100% effective vaccine and an instant and free cure for COVID-19 are available. They will become known in popular culture as Morlocks. Well, you SAID crazy.
